Package core.common

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bag
    Game words bag model.
    Board
    Word games board representation.
    Cell
    Cell that will stack tiles on a word games board.
    Dictionary
    Dictionary model storing all available words for word games.
    Game
    Word game model usable for Scrabble and Topword games.
    Player
    Player model for word games, with a name, a score and a rack.
    Tile
    Word games tile representation (letter + value).
    Word
    Word representation as a list of tiles, a position on the board and an orientation.
